Texts.Eng: Exploring the strangeness of the Tenebrhae

Texts.Chs: 最奇怪和最神秘的主要种族之一无疑是活着的影子们——我们称之为影族。他们来自最黑暗的世界，毫不夸张地说，他们是影子赋予形式的本质。它违背了所有已知的逻辑和科学，导致许多人怀疑它们是否可能是一个更大的文字力量的一些片段。我们可以肯定的是，它们都在某种程度上连接在一起，在我们无从理解的层面上。
Texts.Eng: One of the strangest and most enigmatic of the major races is without doubt the living shadow-things we call the Tenebrhae. Hailing from the darkest worlds, they are quite literally the essence of shadow given form. It defies all known logic and science, leading many to wonder if they may be some fragment of a literal greater power. All we know for certain is that they are all connected on some level we cannot begin to comprehend.

Texts.Eng: This means that every single one of them knows the rest, perhaps even intimately. There are no strangers among their kind, but likewise, no real known language either. They speak, but not in a way that makes sense to most. Often it takes the form of what we would refer to as riddles, if they speak at all.
